subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Yuri Foreman, the aspiring rabbi who briefly held a piece of the 154-pound title, took a beating at the hands of Pawel Wolak in Las Vegas and lost for the second straight time.
snippet: Yuri Foreman, the aspiring rabbi who briefly held a piece of the 154-pound title, took a beating at the hands of Pawel Wolak in Las Vegas and lost for the second straight time.
